infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Alonix needs your location to show nearby activities, track your runs, and find drivers.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Alonix needs your location to track your workouts and safety status even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: Alonix uses your motion data to track your steps and activity levels.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Alonix to use your location.

plugins.motionPermission: Allow Alonix to access your motion sensors for fitness tracking.
